[Home](./index.md) &gt; [blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [VariableMap](./blockly.variablemap.md)

## VariableMap class

Class for a variable map. This contains a dictionary data structure with variable types as keys and lists of variables as values. The list of variables are the type indicated by the key.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class VariableMap implements IVariableMap<IVariableModel<IVariableState>> 
```
**Implements:** [IVariableMap](./blockly.ivariablemap.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IVariableModel](./blockly.ivariablemodel.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IVariableState](./blockly.ivariablestate.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addVariable(variable)](./blockly.variablemap.addvariable.md) |  | Adds the given variable to this variable map. |
|  [changeVariableType(variable, newType)](./blockly.variablemap.changevariabletype.md) |  |  |
|  [clear()](./blockly.variablemap.clear.md) |  | Clear the variable map. Fires events for every deletion. |
|  [createVariable(name, opt\_type, opt\_id)](./blockly.variablemap.createvariable.md) |  | Create a variable with a given name, optional type, and optional ID. |
|  [deleteVariable(variable)](./blockly.variablemap.deletevariable.md) |  | Delete a variable and all of its uses without confirmation. |
|  [deleteVariableById(id)](./blockly.variablemap.deletevariablebyid.md) |  | Delete a variables by the passed in ID and all of its uses from this workspace. May prompt the user for confirmation. |
|  [getAllVariableNames()](./blockly.variablemap.getallvariablenames.md) |  | Returns all of the variable names of all types. |
|  [getAllVariables()](./blockly.variablemap.getallvariables.md) |  | Return all variables of all types. |
|  [getTypes()](./blockly.variablemap.gettypes.md) |  | Returns a list of unique types of variables in this variable map. |
|  [getVariable(name, opt\_type)](./blockly.variablemap.getvariable.md) |  | Find the variable by the given name and type and return it. Return null if it is not found. |
|  [getVariableById(id)](./blockly.variablemap.getvariablebyid.md) |  | Find the variable by the given ID and return it. Return null if not found. |
|  [getVariablesOfType(type)](./blockly.variablemap.getvariablesoftype.md) |  | Get a list containing all of the variables of a specified type. If type is null, return list of variables with empty string type. |
|  [getVariableUsesById(id)](./blockly.variablemap.getvariableusesbyid.md) |  | Find all the uses of a named variable. |
|  [renameVariable(variable, newName)](./blockly.variablemap.renamevariable.md) |  | Rename the given variable by updating its name in the variable map. |
|  [renameVariableById(id, newName)](./blockly.variablemap.renamevariablebyid.md) |  | Rename a variable by updating its name in the variable map. Identify the variable to rename with the given ID. |
